note: Grew up in Silicon Valley, did the big corporate technology thing, then moved to wine country, produced Wine Biz Radio (RIP), then making films and video as an entrepreneur, then into nonprofit arts center managing the Sebastopol Documentary Film Festival, and now teaching media and stagecraft to teenagers in a public high school. Kinda freaky, considering I also dabble in ham radio, electronics and eurorack synths.
